about_the_game:
What would make a great hero like Achilles harvest olives for an ordinary market woman? What would drive the great Greek heroes to become ordinary couriers? The desire for fame and adventure, of course!

Ahapika is the most heroic agency in Greece, and only the most valorous and glorious are accepted. Follow the path of its origin from the very beginning! You will have to fulfill the requests and orders of both ordinary mortals and the great Olympian gods. But be careful - sometimes an innocent request to deliver a package can lead to fatal consequences. Fight with beasts and monsters, argue with gods and titans, gather the best heroes to help.

An exciting story:

In your adventures, you will immerse yourself in the multifaceted world of intrigues and mysteries of Ancient Greece. When carrying out the orders of the gods, be careful: the proud inhabitants of Olympus do not forgive mistakes and may hold a grudge against you for a long time. You will have to understand what a new mysterious prophecy means to the world, and, of course, fight in the great final battle. It depends only on your actions which side you will be on, and who will come to the rescue at this hour.

Classic bullet heaven battles:

Many different heroes, various weapons, hordes of enemies, powerful amulets and Divine Gifts! More than 50 unique story tasks! Fight and unlock new heroes. Be prepared for the fact that powerful forces may intervene in the battle, both to help you and to counteract. Hone your skills on the arena in endless mode.

Welcome to "AHAPIKA - Heroic Agency"!
